Desc.entry: A registered charity that aims to support people suffering from macular degeneration for which there is at present no cure. The meetings are essentially social occasions with speakers of interest. A Christmas lunch is also organised.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Sheffield Royal Society for the Blind

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Thurs in the month 1.30-3.30pm, includes refreshments. No meeting in January or August.
